verses.roman:
nā kahile haya mora kṛta-ghnatā-doṣa
dambha kari bali' śrotā, nā kariha roṣa

synonyms: nā kahile—if I do not say; haya—there is; mora—my; kṛta-ghnatā-doṣa—fault of ingratitude; dambha kari—I am proud; bali'-taking as; śrotā—O readers; nā kariha roṣa—do not be angry.
translation: If I did not disclose this fact, I would be guilty of ingratitude to the Lord. Therefore, my dear readers, please do not consider me too proud and be angry at me.
